author: John Mauro
description:
Ghosts of the past are not so easily eluded in Glass Girls, the debut novel by author Danie Shokoohi, a midwestern Gothic tale of a family with inherited supernatural powers. But these magical gifts come at a cost, and the price is highest for the unfortunate male members of the Glass family. The protagonist of […]

The post REVIEW: Glass Girls by Danie Shokoohi appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Glass Girls by Danie Shokoohi
